const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "length_custom_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        whitespace_length_2_to_10_char: {
          tokenizer: "whitespace",
          filter: ["length_2_to_10_char"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        length_2_to_10_char: {
          type: "length",
          min: 2,
          max: 10,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
